Bo Staff.Name: Stance Change
Bo Staff.Effect: At the start of their turn, the user may choose to become "Attack Stance", which grants +3 damage on attacks, "Defense Stance", which grants +3 DR, or "Neutral Stance". The user starts the game in "Neutral Stance", which confers no bonuses.

Bo Staff.Name: Flowing Strike
Bo Staff.Effect: If the user is in Attack Stance, this move is Range 4, and targets 1 Foe. If the user is in Defense Stance, this move is Burst 1 and AoE. If the user is in both Attack and Defence stance, this attack is Range 4 and has Splash 1.

Bo Staff.Name: Sweep
Bo Staff.Effect: If the user is in Attack Stance, this attack inflicts -2 Evasions/1. If the user is in Defense Stance, the user gains +2 Evasions/1.

Bo Staff.Name: Whirlwind
Bo Staff.Effect: If the user is in Attack Stance, the foe is pushed back 3 spaces. If the user is in Defense Stance, the user is pushed back 3 spaces. If the user is in Neutral Stance, the user and target are pushed back 1 space each.

Bo Staff.Name: Steady Strike
Bo Staff.Effect: Before accuracy, if the user is in Attack Stance, both the user's and the target's debuffs are removed, if the user is in Defense Stance, both the user's and the target's buffs (including stance effects) are removed, and if the user is in Neutral Stance, the user's debuffs and the target's buffs are removed.

Bo Staff.Name: Impeding Grip
Bo Staff.Effect: If the user is in Attack Stance, the user's attacks have +2 range this turn, and if the user is in Defense Stance, attacks that would target the user have -2 range for one round.

Bo Staff.Name: Reprisal
Bo Staff.Effect: If the user is in Attack Stance, their next attack against the target deals an additional 1d8+9 damage. If the user is in Defense Stance, the user gains a 1d8+9 shield.

Bo Staff.Name: Defiance
Bo Staff.Effect: If the user is in Attack Stance, their accuracy rolls gain Advantage; if the user is in Defense Stance, accuracy rolls against them gain Disadvantage. Both effects last until the start of the user's next turn. If in both stances, the user may choose which effect to gain. The user may not have both effects at once.

Bo Staff.Name: Volatile Swing
Bo Staff.Effect: If the user is in Attack Stance, this move has bomb dice. If the user is in Defense Stance, the opponent has inverse bomb dice (the attack affected rolls bomb, but the extra rolls of bomb are instead deducted from the total damage of the attack) for two rounds.

Bo Staff.Name: Reverse Strike
Bo Staff.Effect: The user is locked into their current stance, and their stance's bonus is inverted, for one round. This move cannot be used in Neutral Stance.

Bo Staff.Name: Martial Art
Bo Staff.Effect: Starting after the accuracy roll, the user is in both Attack and Defense Stance for one round. When using a move with different effects depending on the user's stance, both effects apply, unless specified.

Claws.Name: Gouge
Claws.Effect: The target is inflicted with 3 Bleed/1. This bleed is unremovable.

Claws.Name: Animal Instinct
Claws.Effect: Each standard by the user that would involve at least one Claws ability is split into two Claws standards, with all effects that would affect both, including effects that would affect the user's "next attack" and normally unremovable effects, being applied to both. If any such effect is an additive damage/dice effect (including ATK/MAG), it is halved beforehand, rounding up on the first standard that would be affected and down on the second.

Claws.Name: Pounce
Claws.Effect: The user moves as close to the target as possible. The user may choose to lose their next standard this turn to add their full ATK instead and increase range to 7.

Claws.Name: Crippling Slash
Claws.Effect: The user's attacks against the target have +2 ACC for one round.

Claws.Name: Fury Swipes
Claws.Effect: This move ignores outside negative damage factors.

Claws.Name: Close Combat
Claws.Effect: If used on the same turn as Fury Swipes, any bleed the target has is extended for another turn.

Claws.Name: Gyre
Claws.Effect: The user may choose to lose their second standard, but add their full ATK stat to this attack instead. If they do, this move's range is Cone 2 instead.

Claws.Name: Frenzy
Claws.Effect: If the target is bleeding, this move has bomb dice.

Claws.Name: Vengeance
Claws.Effect: If the user's previous standard missed, inflict (or, if already bleeding, increase to) unremovable bleed on the target to 10/1 and its effect to -10 damage.

Claws.Name: Heartseek
Claws.Effect: This move has X dice, where X is the number of times the target has been hit by the user. (Maximum 10d8; multi-hit attacks only add 1 die.)

Claws.Name: Shred
Claws.Effect: If the target is bleeding, this move automatically crits if it hits.

Tonfa.Name: Disarm
Tonfa.Effect: The target(s) lose 1 die on their next (non 0-dice) Standard/Full attack. Every other time this is used on a target (2nd, 4th etc), the target also loses 1 accuracy on their next attack.

Tonfa.Name: Spurn Shot
Tonfa.Effect: If the target is able to, but doesn't use an attack that targets the user from melee on their next turn, the user can AoO them.

Tonfa.Name: Figure 8
Tonfa.Effect: The user may use this attack instead of a Basic Attack for AoOs. If used as an AoO, this cannot be ignored by abilities other than Backstep.

Tonfa.Name: Evasive Stance
Tonfa.Effect: For one round, gain +3 Evasions. During the next turn, deal -10 damage on all attacks.

Tonfa.Name: Hold Over
Tonfa.Effect: Declare 1 range type (excluding Melee). The user may not be targeted by foes with attacks of this range type unless they are in melee for one round. (Abilities with range modifiers, including Splash, Pull, and Push, are not treated as separate range types as abilities without range modifiers.)

Tonfa.Name: Yin Yang
Tonfa.Effect: Choose Yin or Yang. Yin: Physical/Melee. If the target does not deal damage to the user during the next round, deal an extra 1d8+5 damage. Yang: Magical/Homing 4. If the user takes damage from foes' attacks during the next round, deal an extra 1d8+5 damage to the foe per attack.

Tonfa.Name: Standoff
Tonfa.Effect: During the next round, if the target ends their next turn adjacent to the user, deal an additional 1d10+2+(1/2ATK) damage at the beginning of the user's next turn.

Tonfa.Name: Block
Tonfa.Effect: This may be used when the user is attacked, after damage is rolled. After additive damage factors, 1/3 of the attack's damage is removed.

Tonfa.Name: Dazing Hook
Tonfa.Effect: If the user was attacked outside the user's melee last round by the target, inflict the target with Seal/1. This attack's range cannot be reduced by any ability or effect.

Tonfa.Name: Gale Force
Tonfa.Effect: The user may choose to move any targets to any unoccupied space in range. Do not check accuracy and roll damage for allies or the user.
